data.title: Hotel Figueretes, Ibiza Town (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: This simple but inviting hotel is situated just a 10 minute walk from Ibiza Old Town and Ibiza's business district.
data.text:
This simple but inviting hotel is situated just a 10 minute walk from Ibiza Old Town and Ibiza's business district. Restaurants, bars, shops, nightclubs, and public transport are all within easy reach. This 2-storey hotel (no lift) provides a pleasant lobby, which contains a 24-hour reception, and safes for guests' valuables located in reception (1.50€/day) amongst other facilities to its guests. The rooms at Hotel Figueretes are equipped with a TV, a fan, and a private bathroom. Figueretes hotel offers rooms with a balcony or terrace and spectacular sea views or rooms with indoor garden views. Guests have access to the outdoor swimming pool of Apartamentos Mar y Playa, located 2 minutes walk from Hotel Figueretes. The hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast. Each room has its own fan

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.3 for a two-person trip.

Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Please note, the restaurant is located at Hotel Ibiza, 2 minutes' walk from Hotel Figueretes.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
